record.dc:title: 24Lu92 Koger's Island, Lauderdale County, Alabama. Shows relationship of various burials.
record.dc:creator: B.C. Refshauge
record.wpa:narrative: Shows relationship of various burials. Burials #66 & 67 show in the lower right hand corner. Flexed burial in immediate foreground is Burial #74. Headless flexed burial behind #74 is burial #75. Burial #72 is the extended burial in the foreground. The multiple burial directly behind #72 consists of Burial #s 30, 31, 32, 33, & 34. To the right of these is Burial #71. The flexed burial behind these is Burial #26, with Burial #s 27, 28, 101, & 102 in the same pit, but not visible. Directly left of # 26 is Burial #29. The most distant multiple burial consists of Burial #s 35, 36, 37, 38, & 39. The extended burial beyond these is Burial #40.
